BESA.Remote

Class PingSocketThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • BESA.Remote.PingThread
        • BESA.Remote.PingSocketThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class PingSocketThread
extends PingThread
    This thread is responsible for notifying the other container that is alive.
